definition[0]: an animal’s foot that has nails or claws
definition[1]: someone’s hand – used when you are annoyed or angry
example[1]: Keep your filthy paws off me!
definition[2]: if an animal paws a surface, it touches or rubs one place several times with its paw
example[3]: The dog’s pawing at the door again – let him out.
definition[3]: to feel or touch someone in a rough or sexual way that is offensive
example[4]: He’d had too much to drink and started pawing me.
